mapper.select: select sysname from business_file where seq=#{value}
select * from business b join business_member m on b.seq = m.seq join business_file f on f.parent_id = m.id where b.biz_seq=${value}

select distinct(select sysname from business_file where rownum = 1 and parent_id = m.id) "sysName", b.businessname "businessname", b.biz_seq "biz_seq" from business b join business_member m on b.seq = m.seq join business_file f on f.parent_id = m.id
